text: The flag of Pátzcuaro () is a tricolor of purple, yellow, and red with an purépecha glyph charged in the center of the white stripe. While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by Mexican flag. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Related pages== * Pátzcuaro ==References== Pátzcuaro Category:Tricolour flags Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Pátzcuaro
